name: Black Out
description:
You must escape from a castle filled with spooky nightmares.
The power has gone out and your torch only has so much power.
Enemies fear the light so you must locate and repair the generators to turn the power back on.
The game is won when you power up all the generators.

This is a horror-esque game with a GameBoy Color aesthetic.

The sounds were created using: https://jfxr.frozenfractal.com/#
